guide.conclusion: It takes some time to build this so put your thinking cap on .

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Expansion joint
Tools
  • 2 hinges (90° when closed, 180° when open, self closing)
  • Bandsaw
  • Belt Sander
  • Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits
  • Fine sandpaper
  • Safety glasses
  • Slim over expansion joint
  • Tape measure

lines.text: First step is to brain storm and sum up an image .
lines.text_raw: First step is to brain storm and sum up an image .

lines.text: Pick a material you will be able to use . And material is in large volume. ( bamboo, aluminum , lexan , ) exc.
lines.text_raw: Pick a material you will be able to use . And material is in large volume. ( bamboo, aluminum , lexan , ) exc.

lines.text: Now that you have your idea and your materials, as well as all your tools. Let's begin.
lines.text_raw: Now that you have your idea and your materials, as well as all your tools. Let's begin.

lines.text: First we will outline the shape you have to make a templet. Let's build the arms first .lets start with lexan
lines.text_raw: First we will outline the shape you have to make a templet. Let's build the arms first .lets start with lexan

lines.text: Because you have a bend over the ears you will need about 2"extra so 5 3/4 length .
lines.text_raw: Because you have a bend over the ears you will need about 2"extra so 5 3/4 length .

lines.text: New line.then the highgt good 3/4 of an inch wide in the rear then taper to 2 1/8 in the front .
lines.text_raw: New line.then the highgt good 3/4 of an inch wide in the rear then taper to 2 1/8 in the front .

guide.summary: Sunglasses have built in head band , the bands can be changed out by changing the pins.
guide.title: Sunglasses with built in head band
